title: TiKV reported memory is wrong
body:
## Bug Report

<!-- Thanks for your bug report! Don't worry if you can't fill out all the sections. -->

### What version of TiKV are you using?

v4.0.9

### What operating system and CPU are you using?

CentOS + tidb-operator.

### Steps to reproduce

Open TiDB Dashboard.

### What did you expect?

Memory usage should be <= 100%.

### What did happened?

We expect memory usage > 100%.

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1916485/105173986-cd097500-5b5c-11eb-8dc9-edd70f912527.png)

### Cause

In this [PR](https://github.com/tikv/tikv/pull/7074), a container memory quota is returned in the memory info, instead of a system memory capacity.

comments_data.body: Additionally it might be better that we can display a container usage / capacity in this page. @crazycs520 What do you think
I will try to fix it. Just make memory usage cgroup-aware.

### Environment

- All conponents in one container
- Host memory capacity: 16G
- Container memory capacity: 8G

### Summary

|         | Memory Free    | Memory Capacity | Memory Usage |
| ------- | -------------- | --------------- | ------------ |
| TiDB    | Host Available | Host            | Host         |
| TiKV    | Host Free      | Container       | Host         |
| TiFlash | Host Free      | Host            | Host         |
| PD      | Host Available | Host            | Host         |
